pullRequest.title: [ML] DF Analytics should always display operational stats
pullRequest.bodyText:
This commit populates the _stats API response with sensible "empty"
data_counts and memory_usage objects when the job itself
has not started reporting them.

commit.message:
[ML] DF Analytics should always display operational stats

This commit populates the _stats API response with sensible "empty"
`data_counts` and `memory_usage` objects when the job itself
has not started reporting them.

nodes.bodyText: What prevents timestamp from being null here?

commit.message: No need to assign unused response to local var
